artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of himalaya sidebar keybindings, pagination issues, and preloading opportunities with implementation recommendations

summary: Research identified three issues: (1) sidebar single-letter action keys were removed in Task 56 reorganization and moved to which-key <leader>me subgroup, (2) pagination page 2 shows empty due to incorrect total_emails state resulting in async fetch with wrong offset, (3) page preloading can be implemented using vim.defer_fn with background async fetches. Complete implementation plan with code locations provided.
